languages.text: Вы смеете тревожить Короля по пустякам? Сущность бушует, и вы чувствуете, как поток невидимого ветра пронзает ваш корабль насквозь сотнями лезвий. Офицеры, задыхаясь, падают подле ваших ног, и со всех палуб поступают донесения о сотнях погибших. Затем все судно погружается в звенящую тишину, и яркая вспышка оглушает вас на неопределенное время.

traits.locale_text: Вы смеете тревожить Короля по пустякам? Сущность бушует, и вы чувствуете, как поток невидимого ветра пронзает ваш корабль насквозь сотнями лезвий. Офицеры, задыхаясь, падают подле ваших ног, и со всех палуб поступают донесения о сотнях погибших. Затем все судно погружается в звенящую тишину, и яркая вспышка оглушает вас на неопределенное время.

languages.text: How dare you disturb the King with trifles? The entity is furious, and you feel a gust of invisible wind blow a thousand blades right through your ship. Officers are collapsing at your feet, choking, and hundreds of casualties are being reported from every deck. A resonant silence descends on the ship, and a bright flash stuns you for what could be any length of time.
languages.original_text: Вы смеете тревожить Короля по пустякам? Сущность бушует, и вы чувствуете, как поток невидимого ветра пронзает ваш корабль насквозь сотнями лезвий. Офицеры, задыхаясь, падают подле ваших ног, и со всех палуб поступают донесения о сотнях погибших. Затем все судно погружается в звенящую тишину, и яркая вспышка оглушает вас на неопределенное время.

traits.locale_text: How dare you bother the King with trifles? The entity is furious, and you feel a gust of invisible wind blow a thousand blades right through your ship. Officers are collapsing at your feet, choking, and hundreds of casualties are reported from every deck. Then a resonant silence descends on the ship, and a bright flash stuns you — for what could be any length of time, if time even exists anymore.

How dare you disturb the King with trifles? The entity is furious, and you feel a gust of invisible wind blow a thousand blades right through your ship. Officers are collapsing at your feet, choking, and hundreds of casualties are being reported from every deck. A resonant silence descends on the ship, and a bright flash stuns you for what could be any length of time.

languages.text: “你竟敢用琐事来打扰国王？”实体迸发出了怒火。你感到一阵无形的风穿过了你的舰船，仿佛一千把尖刀迎面刺来。军官们倒在你的脚边，窒息而死，每层甲板上都传来了数百人死亡的报告。不知道过了多久，一阵嘹亮的寂静降临在了你的船上，明亮的闪光令你目瞪口呆。
languages.original_text: How dare you disturb the King with trifles? The entity is furious, and you feel a gust of invisible wind blow a thousand blades right through your ship. Officers are collapsing at your feet, choking, and hundreds of casualties are being reported from every deck. A resonant silence descends on the ship, and a bright flash stuns you for what could be any length of time.

traits.locale_text: “你竟敢用琐事来打扰国王？”实体迸发出了怒火。你感到一阵无形的风穿过了你的舰船，仿佛一千把尖刀迎面刺来。军官们倒在你的脚边，窒息而死，每层甲板上都传来了数百人死亡的报告。不知道过了多久，一阵嘹亮的寂静降临在了你的船上，明亮的闪光令你目瞪口呆。

languages.text: ¿Cómo osas importunar al rey con nimiedades? La entidad está furiosa, y sientes un vendaval invisible lanzar un millar de cuchillas por tu nave. Los oficiales caen ante ti, atragantándose, y te informan de cientos de fallecidos en todas las cubiertas. Un silencio resonante cubre la nave, y un destello cegador te aturde durante un tiempo indeterminado.
languages.original_text: How dare you disturb the King with trifles? The entity is furious, and you feel a gust of invisible wind blow a thousand blades right through your ship. Officers are collapsing at your feet, choking, and hundreds of casualties are being reported from every deck. A resonant silence descends on the ship, and a bright flash stuns you for what could be any length of time.

traits.locale_text: ¿Cómo osas importunar al rey con nimiedades? La entidad está furiosa, y sientes un vendaval invisible lanzar un millar de cuchillas por tu nave. Los oficiales caen ante ti, atragantándose, y te informan de cientos de fallecidos en todas las cubiertas. Un silencio resonante cubre la nave, y un destello cegador te aturde durante un tiempo indeterminado.

languages.text: 些細なことで王を乱すとは何事だ。実体は激怒しており、目に見えない一陣の風が、船体に千の刃を吹き付けるのを感じた。足元では士官たちが窒息して倒れ、各デッキからは何百人もの死傷者が報告されている。そして、シン…と船内に静寂が訪れ、明るい閃光に目がくらむ。時間の感覚はもう失っていた。
languages.original_text: How dare you disturb the King with trifles? The entity is furious, and you feel a gust of invisible wind blow a thousand blades right through your ship. Officers are collapsing at your feet, choking, and hundreds of casualties are being reported from every deck. A resonant silence descends on the ship, and a bright flash stuns you for what could be any length of time.

traits.locale_text: 些細なことで王を乱すとは何事だ。実体は激怒しており、目に見えない一陣の風が、船体に千の刃を吹き付けるのを感じた。足元では士官たちが窒息して倒れ、各デッキからは何百人もの死傷者が報告されている。そして、シン…と船内に静寂が訪れ、明るい閃光に目がくらむ。時間の感覚はもう失っていた。

languages.text: Wie kannst du es wagen, den König mit Nichtigkeiten zu belästigen? Das Wesen ist außer sich vor Zorn, und du spürst eine unsichtbare Windböe, die eintausend Klingen mitten durch dein Schiff pustet. Offiziere brechen zu deinen Füßen zusammen, röchelnd, erstickend, und von jedem Deck werden Hunderte von Opfern gemeldet. Ein widerhallendes Schweigen legt sich über das Schiff, und ein heller Blitz betäubt dich. Wie lang, das vermagst du nicht zu sagen.
languages.original_text: How dare you disturb the King with trifles? The entity is furious, and you feel a gust of invisible wind blow a thousand blades right through your ship. Officers are collapsing at your feet, choking, and hundreds of casualties are being reported from every deck. A resonant silence descends on the ship, and a bright flash stuns you for what could be any length of time.

traits.locale_text: Wie kannst du es wagen, den König mit Nichtigkeiten zu belästigen? Das Wesen ist außer sich vor Zorn, und du spürst eine unsichtbare Windböe, die eintausend Klingen mitten durch dein Schiff pustet. Offiziere brechen zu deinen Füßen zusammen, röchelnd, erstickend, und von jedem Deck werden Hunderte von Opfern gemeldet. Ein widerhallendes Schweigen legt sich über das Schiff, und ein heller Blitz betäubt dich. Wie lang, das vermagst du nicht zu sagen.

languages.text: Comment osez-vous déranger le Roi pour des broutilles ? L'entité est furieuse et vous sentez une rafale de vent invisible envoyer un millier de lames droit sur votre vaisseau. Les officiers tombent au sol devant vous, suffocants, et des centaines de victimes sont à déplorer sur chaque pont. Un silence assourdissant s'abat sur le vaisseau et un flash intense vous étourdit pendant un temps incertain.
languages.original_text: How dare you disturb the King with trifles? The entity is furious, and you feel a gust of invisible wind blow a thousand blades right through your ship. Officers are collapsing at your feet, choking, and hundreds of casualties are being reported from every deck. A resonant silence descends on the ship, and a bright flash stuns you for what could be any length of time.

traits.locale_text: Comment osez-vous déranger le Roi pour des broutilles ? L'entité est furieuse et vous sentez une rafale de vent invisible envoyer un millier de lames droit sur votre vaisseau. Les officiers tombent au sol devant vous, suffocants, et des centaines de victimes sont à déplorer sur chaque pont. Un silence assourdissant s'abat sur le vaisseau et un flash intense vous étourdit pendant un temps incertain.

languages.text: Kral'ı böyle önemsiz bir şeyle rahatsız etmeye nasıl cüret edersiniz? Varlık öfkeleniyor. Geminin içinden binlerce bıçak gibi geçen, görünmez bir rüzgârın estiğini hissediyorsun. Subaylar boğularak ayaklarının dibine yığılırken ve her güvertede yüzlerce kayıp rapor ediliyor. Uçsuz gemisine bir sessizlik çöküyor, ardından gelen parlak bir ışık patlaması ise seni belirsiz bir süreliğine sersemletiyor.
languages.original_text: How dare you disturb the King with trifles? The entity is furious, and you feel a gust of invisible wind blow a thousand blades right through your ship. Officers are collapsing at your feet, choking, and hundreds of casualties are being reported from every deck. A resonant silence descends on the ship, and a bright flash stuns you for what could be any length of time.
